law.text: An acquired area of water or land may be used to create and maintain State fish refuges, or for fish management. The Department may grant a right-of-way on or across any acquired area of water or land if the grant does not adversely affect the protection and management of fish. The Department may appoint a caretaker of the area of water or land and make an agreement with the caretaker for proper care and management of the fish refuge.
